name: Troubled Catapult Crossing | Rndgame Jam II (2021)
name_original: Troubled Catapult Crossing | Rndgame Jam II (2021)
description:
Made for Rndgame 2021. This game still has a number of bugs within it and isn't a finished game (I ran out of time to polish it further). If you seem to be at a point where a level cannot be completed press the Enter or P keys to bring up the pause menu and reset the cart to try again.

Game Controls:

  • Left and Right arrows to pan camera
  • Up and Down arrows to change aim/power
  • X or V to toggle between aim/power
  • Z or C to throw

Controllers:

  • You can use any game controllers recognized by SDL with PICO-8

Generic Pico-8 Controls:

  • Toggle Fullscreen: Alt+Enter 
  • Reload/Run/Restart cart: Ctrl+R
  • Mute/Unmute: Ctrl+M
  • Player 1 defaults: Cursors + ZX / NM / CV
  • Player 2 defaults: SDFE + WA
  • Enter or P for pause menu (while running)
